member.name: M:Castle.Services.Logging.NLogIntegration.ThreadContextStack.Pop
member.summary: Pops the top message off the NDC stack.
member.returns: The top message which is no longer on the stack.

member.name: M:Castle.Services.Logging.NLogIntegration.ThreadContextStack.Push(System.String)
member.summary: Pushes the specified text on current thread NDC.
member.returns: An instance of the object that implements IDisposable that returns the stack to the previous level when IDisposable.Dispose() is called. To be used with C# using() statement.

member.name: P:Castle.Services.Logging.NLogIntegration.ThreadContextStacks.Item(System.String)
member.value: The value of is ignored because NLog only has a single stack
